dimension: 9 9/16 x 4 13/16 in. (24.29 x 12.22 cm) (excluding tie, tails and hanging beads)
title: Loincloth
description: cloth panel with linear embroidery and applique; 4 vertical rows of buttons and 2 vertical rows of metal disks; 3 maroon-dyed monkey tails with multicolored pompons at ends; fringe of hanging beads between tails
